nodes.text: Lisa Fuson (born October 25, 1963) is a voice actress who has played several roles in Star Wars video games.

Her roles were mainly Princess Leia and Vana Sage, but she also acted in the Nickelodeon cartoon series, Hey Arnold!, in several minor roles. Following a decade of absence, she reprised the role of Leia for LEGO Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Out.
Outside of voice acting, Lisa Fuson has acted on L.A. Vice.
